00046             function                install_package( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         $PackageAlgoritms = get_package( 'core::package_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00052                         $MasterPackage = explode( '#' , $Security->get_gp( 'package_selection' , 'string' ) );
00053                         $PackageAlgoritms->install_package( 
00054                               $UploadFileAccess->UploadedFilePath , $MasterPackage[ 0 ] , $MasterPackage[ 1 ]
00055                         );
00056                   }
00057                   catch( Exception $e )
00058                   {
00059                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00060                   }
00061             }
00062       
00081             function                delete_package( $Options )
00082             {
00083                   try
00084                   {
00085                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086                         $PackageName = $Security->get_gp( 'package_name' , 'string' );
00087                         $PackageVersion = $Security->get_gp( 'package_version' , 'string' );
00088                         
00089                         $ROOT_DIR = _get_root_dir( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , INSTALL_DIR );
00090                         $PackageDirectory = _get_package_path( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR );
00091                         
00092                         _delete_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00093                   }
00094                   catch( Exception $e )
00095                   {
00096                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00097                   }
00098             }
00099       
00118             function                controller( $Options )
00119             {
00120                   try
00121                   {
00122                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00123                         
00124                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_delete_package' );
00125                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00126                         
00127                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_install_package' );
00128                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00129                   }
00130                   catch( Exception $e )
00131                   {
00132                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00133                   }
00134             }
00135       }
